ceeActivities.para: Design and implementation of Various IT infrastructures
Testing and Certification of specimen from industries
Conduct of Skill development programs for the youth in the locality
Conduct of Faculty & staff development programs

ceeFee.para: The fee of each course may vary according to the duration of course, subject area, the number of participants, etc., which will be announced in the related course brochure.
The TADA and honorarium of the expert for different consultancy work are determined as per the institutional guidelines.
